A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best\, behind Empire and Rogue One. Very meaningful movie to me. It was about failure\, hope\, finality\, new beginnings. It was about\, even when everything has gone wrong and it's your fault\, we all make mistakes and it's not the end. It's about how we are all good and bad. We can be reckless\, impulsive\, trigger happy\, but can also be full of hope\, resolve\, passion\, and devotion. Amazing movie! Watching it once it's not enough!
